verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:3
verses.text: And David sent and enquired after the woman. And one said, Is not this Bath–sheba, the daughter of Eliam, the wife of Uriah the Hittite?

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:4
verses.text: And David sent messengers, and took her; and she came in unto him, and he lay with her; for she was purified from her uncleanness: and she returned unto her house.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:5
verses.text: And the woman conceived, and sent and told David, and said, I am with child.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 11:6
verses.text: And David sent to Joab, saying, Send me Uriah the Hittite. And Joab sent Uriah to David.
